did.unittitle: Skizzenbuch : collection of drawings done for Junkers Flugzeug- und Motorenwerke AG, Dessau,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Skizzenbuch : collection of drawings done for Junkers Flugzeug- und Motorenwerke AG, Dessau, M0795, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes teaching materials for artists hired by Junkers to draw war events. These documents come, for the most part, from the archives of Johannes Lebek. All the teaching materials for the engine-builders were given by Katharina Michel.
